decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.
Condition : 2 - The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the development hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing building.

Condition : 3 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (P-20SC-02, 03 received 31/03/2017 and P-20SC-01B, 04A received 10th May 2017) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.

Condition : 4 - The outbuilding hereby permitted shall not be used as a bedroom, kitchen or living room and shall not be occupied as separate or ancillary residential accommodation or for business use.

Condition : 5 - No additional windows or other glazed openings shall be formed in the walls of the extension and the walls of the outbuilding hereby approved and no additional doors inserted in the building without the prior written consent of the Local Planning Authority.
description: Erection of a single storey rear extension and a single storey outbuilding at the rear garden of the house
